page.title: 15INTERESTS IN THEDDINGWORTH
page.content: A great variety of hobbies and interests are followed in the 80 households of our village. More than 80 were listed with most households claiming interest in 4-6 activities, grouped as follows:{SPORTS & FITNESS} (watching/playing) canoeing, BMX bikes, motor cycling, riding, skittles, sailing, shooting, walking, yoga, jogging.{COLLECTING}postcards, country house models, thimbles, guns. {READING. MUSIC, DANCE, THEATRE.}piano, electric organ, guitar, singing in choirs, ballet, cinema, concerts, classical & modern music, jazz.{ARTS,} {CRAFTS, DIY.}canoe building, furniture restoring, needlework, knitting, painting, pottery, scraper board, upholstery, wood turning. During the last year 11% of the adults in the village attended evening classes.
